ic.header.title: Interview Copilot
ic.stepcomponent.title1: Step 01 : Start Your Meeting & Buy Access Tokens
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-1: Begin by opening your preferred online meeting platform.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-3: Copy and paste the token from your email, then start your interview.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-2: Upload your resume and the job description.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-3: Select your meeting platform, Google Meeting, Zoom, MS Teams, Webex, or Others
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-4: Ensure you are using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge
ic.stepcomponent.detail3-1: Ensure the interviewer is ready in the meeting room.
ic.stepcomponent.detail3-2: Click “Start Recording” when you are ready to start the interview.
ic.stepcomponent.detail3-3: Once you need Interview Copilot to help with the answer, click “Generate Answer”.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-11: Ensure the interviewer is ready in the meeting room.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-12: Click “Start Recording” when you are ready to start the interview.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-13: Select your meeting platform, click “Share Your Meeting” to select and share the audio of the entire screen.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-14: Ensure you are using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-11: Ensure the interviewer is ready in the meeting room.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-12: Click “Start Recording” when you are ready to start the interview.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-13: Once you need Interview Copilot to help with the answer, click “Generate Answer”.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-112: Upload your resume and the job description.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-113-select-2: , click 'Capture Screen' to select and share the audio of the Tab where the Google Meeting is located.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-114: Ensure you are using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-111: Ensure the interviewer is ready in the meeting room.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-112: Click “Start Recording” when you are ready to start the interview.
ic.stepcomponent.detail2-113: Once you need Interview Copilot to help with the answer, click “Generate Answer”.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-1112: Upload your resume and the job description.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-1114: Ensure you are using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
ic.stepcomponent.detail1-1115: Ensure you are not wearing a headset.
